name: ylluminarious's Dark Gitter
description: An edit of MATU's Dark Gitter with some fixes for the new site layout.
additional_info:
An edit of MATU's Dark Gitter. This has some fixes for the new site layout. FYI, Gitter has added a built-in dark style which can be an alternative to this style since it's maintained by Gitter itself and it's okay (although it's a bit too light gray for my taste). You can select this theme in Gitter by clicking your profile picture in the upper right-hand corner and clicking on "Toggle Dark Theme". Updates:
    Updated on June 15, 2018, incorporating improvements to the source code formatting as well as various style improvements. Some better coloration was added and a good number of new elements are covered now thanks to these changes. These improvements were contributed by J0k3r and more of his work can be found here on Github. Thanks J0k3r!
    Updated on May 31, 2018 as per this discussion.
